BioRobots

Description

Biorobots is a game inspired by the disastrous events at the 4th Reactor at the Chernobyl Power Plant. You take the role of a "biorobot", a person with no choice but to do the work he's been ordered to. Clean up the debris from the roof of the plant fast enough, or suffer radiation posioning.The game is created within the Unity engine, it features random prefab placement and a damage-over-time system for radiation.
